languages.text: При попадании есть шанс, что атака окажется критической и нанесет двойной урон. Этот шанс также задается корабельным ауспексом. В случае наличия у цели пустотных щитов урон от попавшей атаки поглощается ими. Оставшийся непоглощенным урон уменьшается броней, после чего цель получает остаток как финальный урон атаки.

When a hit is confirmed, there is a chance that the attack scores a critical hit and deals double damage. This chance can be affected by the ship's auspex. If the target has active {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, some damage from the incoming attack will be absorbed by them. The damage that was not absorbed is then reduced by a flat amount based on armour, and finally the target's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} suffers the remainder of the attack's damage.
languages.original_text: При попадании есть шанс, что атака окажется критической и нанесет двойной урон. Этот шанс также задается корабельным ауспексом. В случае наличия у цели пустотных щитов урон от попавшей атаки поглощается ими. Оставшийся непоглощенным урон уменьшается броней, после чего цель получает остаток как финальный урон атаки.

traits.locale_text: When a hit is confirmed, there is a chance that the attack scores a critical hit and deals double damage. This chance is also determined by the ship's auspex. If the target has active shields, some damage from the incoming attack will be absorbed by them. The damage that was not absorbed is then reduced by a flat amount of armour, then the target's hull suffers the remainder of the attack's damage.

When a hit is confirmed, there is a chance that the attack scores a critical hit and deals double damage. This chance is also determined by the ship's auspex. If the target has active shields, some damage from the incoming attack will be absorbed by them. The damage that was not absorbed is then reduced by a flat amount of armour, then the target's hull suffers the remainder of the attack's damage.

When a hit is confirmed, there is a chance that the attack scores a critical hit and deals double damage. This chance can be affected by the ship's auspex. If the target has active shields, some damage from the incoming attack will be absorbed by them. The damage that was not absorbed is then reduced by a flat amount based on armour, and finally the target's hull suffers the remainder of the attack's damage.

When a hit is confirmed, there is a chance that the attack scores a critical hit and deals double damage. This chance can be affected by the ship's auspex. If the target has active {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, some damage from the incoming attack will be absorbed by them. The damage that was not absorbed is then reduced by a flat amount based on armour, and finally the target's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} suffers the remainder of the attack's damage.

When a hit is confirmed, there is a chance that the attack scores a critical hit and deals double damage. This chance can be affected by the ship's auspex. If the target has active {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, some damage from the incoming attack will be absorbed by them. The damage that was not absorbed is then reduced by a flat amount based on armour, and finally the target's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} suffers the remainder of the attack's damage.

languages.text: Ist ein Treffer erfolgreich, besteht die Chance, dass der Angriff einen kritischen Treffer erzielt und doppelten Schaden verursacht. Diese Chance kann durch das Auspex des Schiffs beeinflusst werden Verfügt das Ziel über aktive {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}Schilde{/g}, wird ein Teil des Schadens durch den eingehenden Angriff von ihnen absorbiert. Der nicht absorbierte Schaden wird anschließend um einen pauschalen Betrag basierend auf Rüstung reduziert und schließlich erleidet der {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpf{/g} des Ziels den verbleibenden Schaden des Angriffs.
languages.original_text: When a hit is confirmed, there is a chance that the attack scores a critical hit and deals double damage. This chance can be affected by the ship's auspex. If the target has active {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, some damage from the incoming attack will be absorbed by them. The damage that was not absorbed is then reduced by a flat amount based on armour, and finally the target's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} suffers the remainder of the attack's damage.

traits.locale_text: Ist ein {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} erfolgreich, besteht die Chance, dass der Angriff einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritischen Treffer{/g} erzielt und doppelten Schaden verursacht. Diese Chance kann durch das Auspex des Schiffs beeinflusst werden Verfügt das Ziel über aktive Schilde, wird ein Teil des Schadens durch den eingehenden Angriff von ihnen absorbiert. Der nicht absorbierte Schaden wird anschließend um einen pauschalen Betrag basierend auf {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} reduziert und schließlich erleidet der {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpf{/g} des Ziels den verbleibenden Schaden des Angriffs.

languages.text: En cas de frappe confirmée, il y a des chances que l'attaque porte un coup critique et inflige le double de dégâts. Ces chances peuvent être affectées par l'auspex du vaisseau. Si la cible dispose de {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g} actifs, ils absorberont une partie des dégâts subis. Les dégâts non absorbés sont ensuite réduits d'une valeur fixe dépendant de l'armure avant que finalement, la {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}coque{/g} de la cible subisse le reste des dégâts.
languages.original_text: When a hit is confirmed, there is a chance that the attack scores a critical hit and deals double damage. This chance can be affected by the ship's auspex. If the target has active {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, some damage from the incoming attack will be absorbed by them. The damage that was not absorbed is then reduced by a flat amount based on armour, and finally the target's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} suffers the remainder of the attack's damage.

traits.locale_text: En cas de {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}frappe{/g} confirmée, il y a des chances que l'attaque porte un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}coup critique{/g} et inflige le double de dégâts. Ces chances peuvent être affectées par l'auspex du vaisseau. Si la cible dispose de boucliers actifs, une part des dégâts subis seront absorbés par ces derniers. Les dégâts non absorbés sont ensuite réduits d'une valeur fixe basée sur l'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g}, et enfin la {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}coque{/g} de la cible subit le reste des dégâts.

languages.text: 当舰船命中目标时，可能会造成暴击，造成双倍伤害。暴击几率取决于舰船装备的俄歇矩阵。 如果目标拥有{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}护盾{/g}，则其中一部分攻击伤害会被护盾吸收。未被吸收的伤害将会根据目标的护甲进行减伤，剩余的攻击伤害则会由目标的{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体{/g}承受。
languages.original_text: When a hit is confirmed, there is a chance that the attack scores a critical hit and deals double damage. This chance can be affected by the ship's auspex. If the target has active {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, some damage from the incoming attack will be absorbed by them. The damage that was not absorbed is then reduced by a flat amount based on armour, and finally the target's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} suffers the remainder of the attack's damage.

traits.locale_text: 当舰船{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标时，可能会造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}暴击{/g}，造成双倍伤害。暴击几率取决于舰船装备的俄歇矩阵。 如果目标拥有护盾，则其中一部分攻击伤害会被护盾吸收。未被吸收的伤害将会根据目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}进行减伤，剩余的攻击伤害则会由目标的{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体{/g}承受。

languages.text: Cuando se confirme un impacto, cabe la posibilidad de que el ataque conforme un impacto crítico e inflija el doble de daño. Esta posibilidad puede verse alterada por el aúspex de la nave. En caso de que el objetivo tenga {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}escudos{/g} activos, absorberán parte del daño que cause el ataque recibido. El daño que no se absorba se verá reducido en una cantidad fija en función de la armadura y, a continuación, el {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}casco{/g} del objetivo sufrirá el resto del daño del ataque.
languages.original_text: When a hit is confirmed, there is a chance that the attack scores a critical hit and deals double damage. This chance can be affected by the ship's auspex. If the target has active {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, some damage from the incoming attack will be absorbed by them. The damage that was not absorbed is then reduced by a flat amount based on armour, and finally the target's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} suffers the remainder of the attack's damage.

traits.locale_text: Cuando se confirme un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g}, cabe la posibilidad de que el ataque conforme un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}impacto crítico{/g} e inflija el doble de daño. Esta posibilidad puede verse alterada por el aúspex de la nave. En caso de que el objetivo tenga escudos activos, absorberán parte del daño que cause el ataque recibido. El daño que no se absorba se verá reducido en una cantidad fija en base a la {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} y, a continuación, el {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}casco{/g} del objetivo sufrirá el resto del daño del ataque.

languages.original_text: On a hit, there is a chance that the attack will be critical and do double damage. This chance is also set by the ship's auspex. If the target has void shields, the damage from the hit is absorbed by them. The remaining unabsorbed damage is reduced by the armour, and the target takes the remainder as final attack damage.

languages.text: 攻撃命中が確認されると、攻撃がクリティカルヒットとなり、2倍のダメージを与える可能性がある。この確率は船のアウスペクスの影響を受ける。 ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}シールド{/g}がアクティブな場合、攻撃の一部はシールドに吸収される。吸収されなかったダメージはまずアーマーに基づき均一量で軽減され、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体{/g}は残りの攻撃ダメージを負う。
languages.original_text: When a hit is confirmed, there is a chance that the attack scores a critical hit and deals double damage. This chance can be affected by the ship's auspex. If the target has active {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, some damage from the incoming attack will be absorbed by them. The damage that was not absorbed is then reduced by a flat amount based on armour, and finally the target's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} suffers the remainder of the attack's damage.

traits.locale_text: 攻撃{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}が確認されると、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}クリティカルヒット{/g}となり2倍のダメージを与える可能性がある。この確率は船のアウスペクスによって変化する。 ターゲットのシールドがアクティブの場合、攻撃によるダメージの一部はシールドに吸収される。吸収されなかったダメージはまず{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}に基づき均一量で軽減され、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体{/g}には残りの攻撃ダメージが付与される。
